q: mother's home. colon said that her mother, who was out of town, has lived at the house for 42 years and that yesterday's main break was the second at the site in 12 years. it was the same pipe, but it didn't get as bad as it did this time, colon said. colon said gas and electric service was disrupted for a few hours. contact staff writer Sam Wood at 215-854-2796 or because your contributions are currently under review, no comments can be made at this time.

to$ 2.85. apn issued a statement today saying it had been advised by inm, led by Tony O'Reilly , that it had received several approaches for its 39% shareholding, valued at around$ 460 million. the board of apn announced today that its significant shareholder, inm, which owns 191 million( shares, approximately 39% of apn's issued shares) has informed the company that it recently received approaches from several parties in respect of its shareholding in apn, apn said. inm said it wanted apn to be involved in its strategic review of its holding, to ensure that the outcome is in the best interests of apn's shareholders.
